discourse_list.title: EIP Draft - Stupid Simple Gas Abstracted Transaction (SSGAT) Encoding Standard

content.content: A transaction encoding standard that facilitates users paying mining fees with ERC20 tokens. PR: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2329
content.GPT-summary: The post introduces a new transaction encoding standard called Stupid Simple Gas Abstracted Transaction (SSGAT) that allows users to pay mining fees with ERC20 tokens. The post includes a link to the proposal on GitHub and mentions that it is a draft. The post also invites feedback and constructive criticism on the proposal.
